content: ** update 01/21/13** i have just updated the pattern including the latest errata please be sure you have the correct engv3 in english or frv3 in french version of the pattern before casting on errata rib pattern you should read p1 ktbl p2 ktbl repeat between and end with p1 motif de côtes 1 m envers 1 m à l endroit torse 2 m envers 1 m à l endroit torse répéter entre et terminer par une maille envers i imagined these socks during my stay in paris the waves and lines remind me of the seine river it should fit a standard woman s foot and is meant to be a good beginner sock also this pattern should suit any variegated solid or semi-solid sock yarn **gauge ** 8st = 1 inch in stockinette st in the round 13st = 1 inch in rib pattern unstretched in the round take time to save time check your gauge
